non_compliant.section: 乘客：透過 Uber 帳戶預約或接受交通服務和相關服務 (包括透過 Uber Connect 提供包裹外送和退貨服務) 的乘客。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with information concerning the processing of personal data, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, the envisaged period for which the personal data will be stored, or, if not possible, the criteria used to determine that period, the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to such processing, the right to data portability, the right to withdraw consent at any time where consent is the legal basis for processing, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the source of the personal data if they are not collected from the data subject, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes of processing personal data, the categories of personal data collected, the recipients of the data, the storage period, the rights of the data subject, and the existence of automated decision-making.

non_compliant.section: 職業駕駛：透過 Uber 帳戶或合作運輸公司個別為乘客提供交通服務之職業駕駛。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with information concerning the processing of personal data, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, the envisaged period for which the personal data will be stored, or, if not possible, the criteria used to determine that period, the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to such processing, the right to data portability, the right to withdraw consent at any time where consent is the legal basis for processing, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the source of the personal data if they are not collected from the data subject, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes of processing personal data, the categories of personal data collected, the recipients of the data, the storage period, the rights of the data subject, and the existence of automated decision-making.

non_compliant.section: 訂單收件人：透過 Uber Eats 或 Postmates 帳戶叫車或接收外送或自取的餐點或其他產品和服務之使用者。這包括未建立和/或未登入帳戶，而是透過訪客身分結帳功能使用外送或自取服務之使用者。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with information concerning the processing of personal data, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, the envisaged period for which the personal data will be stored, or, if not possible, the criteria used to determine that period, the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to such processing, the right to data portability, the right to withdraw consent at any time where consent is the legal basis for processing, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the source of the personal data if they are not collected from the data subject, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes of processing personal data, the categories of personal data collected, the recipients of the data, the storage period, the rights of the data subject, and the existence of automated decision-making.

non_compliant.section: 合作外送夥伴：透過 Uber Eats 或 Postmates 提供外送服務之使用者。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with information concerning the processing of personal data, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, the envisaged period for which the personal data will be stored, or, if not possible, the criteria used to determine that period, the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to such processing, the right to data portability, the right to withdraw consent at any time where consent is the legal basis for processing, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the source of the personal data if they are not collected from the data subject, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes of processing personal data, the categories of personal data collected, the recipients of the data, the storage period, the rights of the data subject, and the existence of automated decision-making.

non_compliant.section: 訪客使用者：不具備 Uber 帳戶，但接受其他 Uber 帳戶擁有者所訂購搭乘和外送服務之使用者，這包括接受由 Uber Health、Uber Central、Uber Direct 或 Uber 企業版顧客 (統稱為「企業顧客」) 所安排服務之使用者，或接受由朋友、家庭成員或其他個人帳戶擁有者及禮物卡收件人所安排服務之使用者，包括透過 Uber Connect 和禮物卡收件人。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide the data subject with information concerning the processing of personal data, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data have been or will be disclosed, the envisaged period for which the personal data will be stored, or, if not possible, the criteria used to determine that period, the existence of the right to request from the controller access to and rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing concerning the data subject or to object to such processing, the right to data portability, the right to withdraw consent at any time where consent is the legal basis for processing, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, the source of the personal data if they are not collected from the data subject, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the purposes of processing personal data, the categories of personal data collected, the recipients of the data, the storage period, the rights of the data subject, and the existence of automated decision-making.
